title: Jahlil Okafor
summary: Jahlil Obika Okafor (pronounced /ˈdʒɑː liːl/;[1] born December 15, 1995) is a Nigerian-American[2] professional basketball player who is a free agent. He played his freshman season of college for the 2014–15 Duke national championship team. He was selected with the third overall pick in the 2015 NBA draft by the Philadelphia 76ers. He has previously played in the NBA for the Philadelphia 76ers, Brooklyn Nets, New Orleans Pelicans and the Detroit Pistons.
